law.catch_line: Change of designated office or agent for service of process.

text.section: In order to change its designated office, a limited partnership or a foreign limited partnership shall comply with KRS 14A.5-010.
A limited partnership or foreign limited partnership may change its registered office or registered agent as provided in KRS 14A.4-020.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 102, effective January 1, 2011. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 94, effective July 12, 2006.
